maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastmaterialwrapper.cpp
/*

provided at the time of installation or download, or which otherwise 
accompanies this software in either electronic or hard copy form.

#include "beastwrappers/beastmaterialwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beasttexturewrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastshaderwrapper.h"

namespace beastmaya {

void BeastMaterial::setColor( ILBMaterialChannel c, ILBLinearRGBA& color )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetMaterialColor(obj(), c, &color));
}

void BeastMaterial::setTexture( ILBMaterialChannel c, BeastTexture& tex )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetMaterialTexture(obj(), c, tex.obj()));
}

void BeastMaterial::setScale( ILBMaterialChannel c, float scale )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetMaterialScale(obj(), c, scale));
}

void BeastMaterial::setShader( BeastShader& shader )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetShader(obj(), shader.obj()));
}

void BeastMaterial::setShaderParamFloat( ILBConstString param, float value )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetShaderParamFloat(obj(), param, value));
}

void BeastMaterial::setShaderParamInt( ILBConstString param, int value )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetShaderParamInt(obj(), param, value));
}

void BeastMaterial::setShaderParamColor( ILBConstString param, ILBLinearRGB& value )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetShaderParamColor(obj(), param, &value));
}

void BeastMaterial::setShaderParamTexture( ILBConstString param, BeastTexture& value )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetShaderParamTexture(obj(), param, value.obj()));
}

}
Please send us your comment about this page
